me.xiajhuan.summer.core.ratelimiter.strategy.impl

类 IpKeyStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.xiajhuan.summer.core.ratelimiter.strategy.impl.IpKeyStrategy
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    KeyStrategy

    public class IpKeyStrategy
extends java.lang.Object
implements KeyStrategy

    IP限流Key策略（Key为：接口签名#调用者IP）， 例如：/summer/security/user/page[GET]#192.168.1.100

    作者:
    xiajhuan
